APC UPS Symmetra LX: Output voltage

trigger_prototype.name: {#BATTERY_PACK}.{#CARTRIDGE_INDEX}: Battery lifetime is not okay
trigger_prototype.description: The battery cartridge health. bit 0 Battery lifetime okay bit 1 Battery lifetime near end, order replacement cartridge bit 2 Battery lifetime exceeded, replace battery bit 3 Battery lifetime near end acknowledged, order replacement cartridge bit 4 Battery lifetime exceeded acknowledged, replace battery bit 5 Battery measured lifetime near end, order replacement cartridge bit 6 Battery measured lifetime near end acknowledged, order replacement cartridge

trigger_prototype.name: {#BATTERY_PACK}.{#CARTRIDGE_INDEX}: Battery status is not okay
trigger_prototype.description: The battery cartridge status: bit 0 Disconnected bit 1 Overvoltage bit 2 NeedsReplacement bit 3 OvertemperatureCritical bit 4 Charger bit 5 TemperatureSensor bit 6 BusSoftStart bit 7 OvertemperatureWarning bit 8 GeneralError bit 9 Communication bit 10 DisconnectedFrame bit 11 FirmwareMismatch

trigger_prototype.name: {#PHASEINDEX}: Unacceptable phase {#PHASEINDEX} input voltage
{#PHASEINDEX}: Unacceptable phase {#PHASEINDEX} output voltage

trigger.name: APC UPS Symmetra LX: Battery has an internal error condition
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Battery has high temperature (over {$BATTERY.TEMP.MAX.WARN}℃ for {$TIME.PERIOD})
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Battery has low capacity (below {$BATTERY.CAPACITY.MIN.WARN}%)
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Battery is Low
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Battery needs replacement
APC UPS Symmetra LX: No SNMP data collection
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Output load is high (over {$UPS.OUTPUT.MAX.WARN}% for {$TIME.PERIOD})
APC UPS Symmetra LX: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Unacceptable input frequency (out of range {$UPS.INPUT_FREQ.MIN.WARN}-{$UPS.INPUT_FREQ.MAX.WARN}Hz for {$TIME.PERIOD})
APC UPS Symmetra LX: Unacceptable input voltage (out of range {$UPS.INPUT_VOLT.MIN.WARN}-{$UPS.INPUT_VOLT.MAX.WARN}V for {$TIME.PERIOD})
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Emergency Static Bypass
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Hardware Failure Bypass
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Off
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is on battery
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is on Smart Boost
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is On Smart Trim
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Rebooting
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Sleeping Until Power Return
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Software Bypass
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Switched Bypass
APC UPS Symmetra LX: UPS is Timed Sleeping

trigger.expression:
( {6.2 APC UPS Symmetra LX by SNMP:system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0].last()}>0 and {6.2 APC UPS Symmetra LX by SNMP:system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0].last()}<10 )
and
( {6.2 APC UPS Symmetra LX by SNMP:system.net.uptime[sysUpTime.0].last()}>0 and {6.2 APC UPS Symmetra LX by SNMP:system.net.uptime[sysUpTime.0].last()}<10 )
trigger.name: APC UPS Symmetra LX: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

dependency.name: APC UPS Symmetra LX: No SNMP data collection
